name: Immortal Heart
description: With the mysterious power of immortality, it's a heart that never stops beating. I wonder what you can make with it?

name: Impact Hammer
description: This hammer has a built-in jet engine. Imagine what happens when it gets up close and personal with the skull of your enemy...

name: Imperial Armor
description: The traditional armor engraved with Lun Midgard Royal Arms, in the changing times, the heraldry representing the royal glory and the high practicability of protecting the users in battle are unchanged.
effect: MDef ＋63,＋2% Max HP for each refining level gained after reaching refining ＋10 (Up to 10%)
